attributes.action: Place homeles people in unuse buildings for shelter.supply small meal 2 time day
attributes.additional_details: I see lots of homeless daily and seems to be more by the day in my city centre in nottingham. they are trying to keep warm with a thin sleeping bag. They are getting ill because of the cold and wet weather
attributes.background: They is too many homeless people out on the streets when they is plenty of building not Been used for a while. it is cold and they are so vunrable. They suffer and can never settle on one spot for being offed by police. They need supporting to help them not make them suffer

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local housing and homelessness is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

http://committee.nottinghamcity.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
